description: Childhood class positively relates to adult self-love.
estimand: Weighted mean change per class unit
notes: Primary model: survey OLS (HC3). Robustness: (1) treat classchild as categorical with Helmert contrasts; (2) ordinal logit with proportional odds check; (3) re-center outcome to z-score for scale sensitivity.

description: Current class inversely relates to depression agreement.
outcome_var: I tend to suffer from depression (wz901dj)

description: CSA exposure associates with higher anxiety agreement.
outcome_var: I tend to suffer from anxiety (npvfh98)-neg
notes: CSA_score_indicator derived via analysis/code/derive_csa_indicator.py (CSA_score>0). Robustness: (1) logistic regression (logit) on indicator vs linear probability; (2) replace indicator with 3-level ordinal bins (0, 1-3, 4+); (3) exclude high-exposure tail (CSA>15) to test leverage.

description: Supportive circles associate with higher self-love.
predictors: In general, people in my *current* social circles tend treat me really well (tmt46e6)
